section.section: Each year, within 120 days after the end of a provider's fiscal year, the provider shall file an application for a renewal certificate of registration in a form satisfactory to the Department.
The Department may charge a late fee if the application and accompanying information are not received by the Department within 120 days after the end of the provider's fiscal year.
Failure to file the required information within 90 days after the due date is a violation of this subtitle.
